Plintissa and Dracona walk to the base, enter, and step into the CR
Chamber...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Iron Raptor" <ironraptor13@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 05, 2000 12:18 AM
Subject: Re: (unknown)


>
>
> * Iron Raptor was just about to explain to Ramhorn that the two bots that
had been in front of her were merely speaking to her and demonstrating
something in which they had made (the rifle Dracona had presented), no
threat intended and no cause for alarm. But before she could open her mouth
to respond she suddenly saw Ramhorn jump out of the way and then saw why,
the grenade in which Zenyak had thrown had landed near to her but was close
enough to wound all of them!
> Iron Raptor had swung her head around towards Plintissa and Dracona to
shout for them to get out of the way, not concerned about being so close to
the weapon and not moving to save her own hide.
> She had just opened her mouth to yell out a warning to them when the
grenade went off, all that escaped her mouth then was a roar that could have
rocked the whole base if she would have been close enough.
> She breathed hard and slowly moved her massive head around to look at the
damage done when the smoke cleared away, but when she saw the damage she
wished she wouldn't had.
> Her entire side had been ripped up and was nothing more then a mess of
mech-fluid, not even being able to see the slaged circuitry beyond the
fluid...running so thickly down her side. Her shoulder and hip was also in
the same state but not quite as bad as her middle, obvious in dire need of
repair.
> But that wasn't what concerned Iron Raptor at the moment as she swung her
head towards Ramhorn quick enough to cause a pained growl to escape her
mouth, she then looked over at Tritan as he landed beside her.*
>
> " No, but...thank you for the...offer."
>
> * Her answer was pained and hard to say due to the pain in her side, but
as she swung her head back towards Ramhorn it just intensified.*
>
> " If you're...cappable,please get yourself into a CR chamber and then up
to the War room. There's a meeting there and...I want everybot present..and
I want to resolve this little problem of yours."
>
> * With that said she then swung her head over Tritan and towards Plintissa
and Dracona, the pain she was feeling written clearly in her eyes.*
>
> " Yes, use the CR chambers but I...then want you two in the War room as
well, mainly to...deal with Ramhorn's and your problem. Also, if he can't
make it on his own I want you to help him in, almost like a truce for now.
No fighting either."
>
> * She then looked over at Ramhorn again and then back to Plintissa, she
wanted all of them to understand that.*
>
> " Got it? No...fighting. There's far to much slag going on to just...start
shooting it out at the moment and none us are in the condition to do so. Not
to mention...I'm in no mood to break you guys up again but JUST in the mood
to slag all three.I hope I have made myself clear?!"
>
> * She said the last sentence with her teeth bared and a low growl in the
back of her throat, and she WAS just in the mood to rip somebot apart if
they spoke against her. But she knew that she wasn't the one running the
show, or so it seemed to her.
> Iron Raptor then slowly began to rise to her feet but then her wounded
shoulder gave out and she slammed back down to earth, the ground rumbling
and slightly shaking at the impact. With a rather pained snarl she then
tried again and succeeded, but her steps were shaky and uncertain.*
>
> " Now, if you all excuse me, I have a grenade thrower to slag!!"
>
> * She snarled this as she then began to move off in the direction in which
she had seen Zenyak run in, her steps pained but building in speed as she
moved closer and closer to where she had seen him run to.
> Soon her legs pumped painfully as they carried her at a full run to the
coordinates her scanners read that Zenyak was at, rage and the pure urge to
rip him apart making her limbs work harder and faster.
> The ground shock with the force of her clawed feet hitting the ground, the
termers causing a few stones to bounce the closer she got to them.
> It wasn't long until her scanners and senses told her then he was close,
just a few more yards!
> With that Iron Raptor rounded a jutting cliff and finally spotting her
intended target, the cliff on one side and s grove of trees on the other.
> With the sight of her prey in range she then rounded the cliff and began
to storm at top speed towards him, a bloodthirsty roar escaping her mouth
along with the image of row of teeth ready to sink into him!*
>
>
